metadata.title: CVE-2021-30571 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient policy enforcement in DevTools in Google Chrome prior to92.0.4515.107 allowed an attacker who convinced a user to install amalicious extension to potentially perform a sandbox escape via a craftedHTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
